title.tooltip: Your control panel for managing Discord guilds with Slimy bot

loginButton.tooltip: Authorize with Discord to see your guilds and start managing settings

tagline.text: fueled by adhd ‚Äî driven by feet ‚Äî motivated by ducks
tagline.tooltip: This is the energy we bring. You've been warned.

pageTitle.tooltip: All Discord servers where you have access to Slimy bot management

guildName.label: Guild Name
guildName.tooltip: The Discord server name. Click 'Open' to manage it.

role.label: Your Role
role.tooltip: ADMIN = full control | CLUB = view + tools | MEMBER = basic tools only

botStatus.label: Bot Status
botStatus.tooltip: Is Slimy bot installed in this guild? If not, click 'Invite Bot'.

inviteButton.tooltip: Add Slimy bot to this Discord server (requires server Manage Server permission)

openButton.tooltip: Go to this guild's dashboard and settings

pageTitle.tooltip: Guild overview, stats, and admin tasks

weekId.label: Week ID
weekId.tooltip: Current tracking period identifier. Changes weekly.

members.label: Members
members.tooltip: Total members being tracked in this guild's baseline sheet

totalPower.label: Total Power
totalPower.tooltip: Sum of all member power scores. Threshold shows target goal.

simPower.label: SIM Power
simPower.tooltip: Special category power tracking (e.g., Sim-specific metrics). Threshold = goal.

baseline.label: Baseline Sheet
baseline.tooltip: The Google Sheet tab we're reading as source of truth (e.g., 'Baseline (10-24-25)')

today.label: Uploads Today
today.tooltip: Screenshots uploaded to this guild today

total.label: Total Uploads
total.tooltip: All-time screenshot uploads for this guild

apiUptime.label: API Uptime
apiUptime.tooltip: How long the backend has been running without restart

ingestDirectory.tooltip: Scan the screenshots folder and import new images into the database

runVerify.tooltip: Check all member stats for consistency and flag issues

recomputeLatest.tooltip: Recalculate the most recent snapshot's power scores

recomputePushSheet.tooltip: Recalculate stats AND update the Google Sheet. Use with caution.

title.tooltip: Real-time output from the last task you ran. Errors show in red.

selectButton.tooltip: Choose image files from your device to upload (admins only)

emptyState.text: No uploads yet. Drop screenshots here to get started.
emptyState.tooltip: Drag and drop image files here, or click Select Screenshots

thumbnail.tooltip: Click to view full size. Shows uploader and timestamp.

title.tooltip: View and edit the live Google Sheet synced with this guild

corrections.tooltip: Override member stats when manual fixes are needed (e.g., OCR errors)

rescan.tooltip: Re-read the sheet data from Google Sheets API

sheetId.label: Sheet ID
sheetId.tooltip: The Google Sheets document ID (from the URL: docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/[THIS_PART])

defaultTab.label: Default Tab
defaultTab.tooltip: Which sheet tab to read as baseline (e.g., 'Baseline (10-24-25)')

defaultView.label: Default View
defaultView.tooltip: Choose Baseline (historical) or Latest (most recent snapshot) for dashboard display

allowPublicStats.label: Allow Public Stats
allowPublicStats.tooltip: Let non-admins see guild stats via public links (if enabled in future features)

screenshotChannel.label: Screenshot Channel ID
screenshotChannel.tooltip: Discord channel ID where members upload screenshots. Bot will watch this channel.

enableUploads.label: Enable Uploads
enableUploads.tooltip: Allow members to submit screenshots via Discord. Uncheck to disable.

notes.label: Notes
notes.tooltip: Internal notes for admins (not visible to members). E.g., 'Only accept snail screenshots, not duck pics.'

pageTitle.tooltip: Configure which Discord channels the bot monitors and how it behaves in each

refresh.tooltip: Re-fetch the channel list from Discord (updates names and IDs)

channelId.label: Channel ID
channelId.tooltip: Discord's unique identifier for this channel (auto-populated)

modes.label: Modes JSON
modes.tooltip: Advanced: JSON config for bot behavior (e.g., {"chat": true, "react": false})

allowlist.label: Allowlist
allowlist.tooltip: Comma-separated list of allowed features or user IDs (optional)

addButton.tooltip: Add a new channel to monitor (you'll need the channel ID from Discord)

saveButton.tooltip: Commit all changes to the database. Bot will reload config.

pageTitle.tooltip: Customize how Slimy talks in this guild (merges with base personality)

description.text: Paste persona overrides (JSON). These merge with base persona in config/slimy_ai.persona.json.
description.tooltip: Use JSON format. Example: {"tone": "sarcastic", "topics": ["ducks"]}. Leave empty for default.

editor.tooltip: Valid JSON required. Changes take effect immediately after save.

saveButton.tooltip: Update the AI's personality for this guild. Test in Slime Chat afterwards.

lastUpdated.label: Last Updated
lastUpdated.tooltip: Shows who changed the personality last and when

pageTitle.tooltip: Track API costs, model usage, and token consumption

title.tooltip: Visual breakdown of spending across different AI models (GPT-4, Claude, etc.)

requests.label: Requests
requests.tooltip: Total API calls made to this model

inputTokens.label: Input Tokens
inputTokens.tooltip: Tokens sent TO the model (prompts, context)

images.label: Images
images.tooltip: Number of images processed (vision models only)

cost.label: Cost
cost.tooltip: Estimated cost in USD based on model pricing

pageTitle.tooltip: Manually override stats when OCR fails or data needs fixing

note.text: Corrections now live in the dashboard's Current Sheet tab
note.tooltip: This is a legacy view. Most admins use the sheet tab now.

displayName.label: Display Name
displayName.tooltip: Member's in-game name (must match sheet exactly)

metric.label: Metric
metric.tooltip: Which stat to override: Total Power or SIM Power

value.label: Value
value.tooltip: New numeric value. Preview shows before/after.

reason.label: Reason (optional)
reason.tooltip: Why you're making this change (helpful for future you)

addButton.tooltip: Save this override. Takes effect on next sheet sync.

batchImport.tooltip: Upload a CSV file with multiple corrections at once (advanced)

deleteButton.tooltip: Remove this correction and revert to calculated value

pageTitle.tooltip: Member-friendly analyzers for screenshot stats, codes, and power calculations

description.text: Snail Mode unlocks member-friendly analyzers for the guilds linked to your Discord
description.tooltip: These tools work for everyone, not just admins

guildSelect.tooltip: Pick a guild to access its snail tools

title.tooltip: Upload screenshots to extract stats automatically

helpToggle.tooltip: Show/hide tips for getting the best analysis results

dropzone.text: Drag and drop screenshots here, or click to browse
dropzone.tooltip: Max 8 screenshots, 10MB each. Supports PNG, JPG, WebP.

prompt.tooltip: Give context to the AI analyzer. Examples: 'focus on DEF stat', 'is this good for PvP?'

runButton.tooltip: Send screenshots to AI vision model. Usually takes 5-15 seconds.

title.tooltip: Your personal snapshot history and analysis runs

lastRun.label: Last Analysis
lastRun.tooltip: Timestamp and prompt from your most recent analysis run

resultsGrid.tooltip: All stats extracted from your screenshots. Click to see source image.

active.tooltip: Show only codes that are currently valid

recent.tooltip: Show codes added in the last week

all.tooltip: Show all codes, including expired ones

copyButton.tooltip: Copy code to clipboard for easy pasting in-game

title.tooltip: Tips for getting the best analysis results

tips.tooltip: Best practices: clear screenshots, no crops, good lighting, etc.

title.tooltip: Quick power calculator for SIM and Total Power math

calculateButton.tooltip: Compute SIM percentage and other derived values

simPercent.label: SIM %
simPercent.tooltip: SIM Power as a percentage of Total Power

placeholder.tooltip: We're writing helpful guides for new players. Check back later!

title.tooltip: Species War event planner and calculator (coming soon)

placeholder.tooltip: Tools for strategizing Species War events. Stay tuned!

pageTitle.tooltip: Real-time chat with Slimy AI in a sandbox environment

guildSelect.tooltip: Choose which guild's personality to use (affects AI responses)

messageInput.tooltip: Chat with Slimy here. It uses the guild's personality config.

adminOnly.label: Admin-only
adminOnly.tooltip: If checked, only admins will see this message in the channel

footer.tooltip: In Discord, use @slimy.ai to talk to the bot. This is just a testing sandbox.

adminBadge.tooltip: This user is a guild admin

pageTitle.tooltip: High-level stats across all guilds you have club access to

guildSelect.tooltip: Switch between guilds to see their club dashboard

snailToolsLink.tooltip: Jump to snail analysis tools for this guild

members.label: Members
members.tooltip: Total tracked members in this guild

lastSnapshot.label: Last Snapshot
lastSnapshot.tooltip: When the most recent stats were captured

latestSnapshot.tooltip: The most recent data pull from the baseline sheet

usage.tooltip: View API costs and model usage

logout.tooltip: Sign out of the admin panel

userRole.tooltip: Your role in the current guild (ADMIN, CLUB, or MEMBER)

title.tooltip: Quick view of backend API and services status

warning.tooltip: Some features may be slow or unavailable

error.tooltip: Backend is unreachable. Check back in a few minutes.

title.tooltip: Mini Slime Chat always available at the bottom of the screen

input.tooltip: Quick question? Type here. Uses current guild's personality.

accessDenied.tooltip: You don't have permission to view this page. Check your guild role.

noGuilds.tooltip: You're not a member of any guilds with Slimy bot. Invite it to a server first.

loadingFailed.tooltip: Something went wrong. Try refreshing the page or check the system health widget.

notFound.tooltip: This page doesn't exist. Use the sidebar to navigate.

analyzed.tooltip: Your screenshots have been analyzed. See results below.

copied.tooltip: Code copied! Paste it in-game to redeem.

uploads.text: No uploads yet. Drop screenshots here to get started.
uploads.tooltip: Drag and drop image files to upload them

codes.tooltip: Check back later for new promo codes

corrections.tooltip: Add a correction to override member stats
